message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 20 dollars to get us going.
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more
I think 40 is too low. I'll give you 50, but I want 55.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the majority.

Alright, let's split it 50/50. I'm not getting any younger.
